extractive_summary: CloudyML | AI ML trainer | Remote • Mentored students through the end-to-end development of machine learning projects, translating complex theoretical concepts in NLP and computer vision into practical, portfolio-ready solutions. • Created structured and industry-aligned learning modules covering key topics like ETL processes, data preprocessing, and predictive analytics to enhance skill development and job readiness. • Designed and guided end-to-end AI/ML projects, including data preprocessing, model building, evaluation, and deployment, using tools like Scikit-learn, Pandas, TensorFlow, and Power BI. • Performed exploratory data analysis (EDA) using SQL to identify sales trends, customer behavior, and key business metrics, enhancing strategic planning.
abstractive_summary: Mohammad Hayat is an experienced professional holding a Masters in Computer Application, skilled in Python, SQL, AI, ML, Gen AI, and Prompt Engineering. He possesses extensive experience as an AI/ML/Data Science/Python trainer, mentoring thousands of students and corporate professionals across numerous institutions like Infosys. His roles primarily involved delivering hands-on training, developing industry-aligned learning modules, and guiding end-to-end project development in data science and machine learning. He effectively translated complex theoretical concepts in areas like NLP, computer vision, and generative AI into practical, portfolio-ready solutions. Hayat's practical expertise is showcased in projects such as an AI-powered stock analysis system and a plant disease prediction model, alongside training over 250 Infosys employees.
